root.name: Arc Style: Soccer!! 3D
root.description: OverviewArc Style: Soccer!! 3D is a soccer game developed and published by Arc System Works for the 3DSWare platform.GameplayArc Style: Soccer!! 3D is a much more casual soccer game than those of the FIFA variety. Arc Style: Soccer!! 3D doesn't use all of the real life rules of soccer, instead using a much more simplified rule set with the objective being faster, easier to pick up games.Arc Style: Soccer!! 3D also features customization in which the player can create an entire team, down to each individual player. The 3DS camera can also be used to take a picture of the players face and put it on created players.
